To install R and RStudio on Windows:

1. [Download R](https://www.stats.bris.ac.uk/R/bin/windows/base/) note this link is for UK users. If you are outside the UK use [this link](https://cran.r-project.org/mirrors.html) selecting your country (or nearest available country))

1. Install R - run the downloaded .exe and follow the prompts

1. [Download RStudio](https://rstudio.com/products/rstudio/download/#download) select the Windows 10/8/7 option

1. Install RStudio - run the downloaded .exe and follow the prompts

**Optional Extras**

1. [Download RTools](https://cran.r-project.org/bin/windows/Rtools/) select the reccomended version

1. Install RTools - run the dowloaded .exe and follow the prompts
